lessons.japanese: 風邪で彼の味覚は鈍くなっていた。
風邪で彼の味覚は鈍くなっていた。
こんなクソまずいもんよく食えるな。お前味覚おかしいんじゃね？
lessons.english: I can't believe you're able to eat crap like this. Is something wrong with your taste buds?

lessons.japanese: 君はとてもいい味覚をしてるよ。
君はとてもいい味覚をしてるよ。
舌が腫れて、味覚がない！
lessons.english: My tongue is swollen, and I can't taste a thing!

lessons.japanese: 秋の味覚が店頭に並ぶ季節となりました。
lessons.english: It was the time of year when the tastes of autumn were lined up in the storefront.

lessons.japanese: 秋の味覚が店頭に並ぶ季節となりました。
lessons.english: It was the season when the tastes of autumn were lined up in the storefront.
